items.title: Collaborative Task Creation and Assignment
items.description: Allow team members to create tasks, assign them to specific members, and set deadlines.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a new task with title, description, assignee, and due date
Assigned user receives a notification upon assignment
Task appears in both creator's and assignee's task lists
non_functional: System should handle at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Task creation and assignment actions should complete within 2 seconds

items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Ensure that any changes to tasks are reflected in real-time for all team members.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated, all users viewing the task list see changes within 2 seconds
Real-time updates work across web and mobile platforms
non_functional: Updates should have latency of less than 2 seconds
System should maintain data consistency across all clients

notes: The requirement is high-level and lacks details on additional features like permissions, integrations, or reporting. Assumptions made: basic task creation, assignment, and real-time updates are core collaboration features.
